text: The failure to properly address the cash/fines/fly tipping/dump mountain/fires/ dodgy export brigade for 10 years is killing the guys trying to do things correctly. The dodgy apples are rotting the whole barrel. @EnvAgency @EmmaHowardBoyd @JamesBevanEA @HMRCgovuk https://t.co/bJJK8kFOB1

@WildetonW @EnvAgency @swan_support have given an update, it sounds like it was a great team effort 👍🏼 Well done to all involved 👏🏼 https://t.co/kBUfN58EA5

I think @EnvAgency think LFT fraud is a financial crime and no harm to environment so not that interested. This is at the heart of so many dodgy waste businesses that are undermining the sector in HS&E standards. It is like doping, it drags everyone down.

@EnvAgency pushing tighter controls on ‘inert fines’ disposed as qualifying for low rate LFT. Fine but the smaller ‘independent’ landfills that I have highlighted before will manipulate / ignore sulphur testing as easily as they do LOI. The crims get an even bigger advantage.

text: @whiterosegreen @EnvAgencyYNE @NEYorksNLincs @YorkshireWater On a closer view the water is escaping through the ‘keyways’ in the covers, the holes you use to lift up the covers. This cover is know as an open key way cover. You can get closed keyway covers which are both water and airtight so stop odours escaping as well.

@Plasmadreamer @EnvAgencyYNE @NEYorksNLincs @YorkshireWater Nutrient pollution is a major threat to this type of grassland & as far as I know there is no phosphate removal from this treatment works: certainly the access chambers are surrounded by big stands of nettles which grow larger by the year and clearly indicate nutrient pollution.
@Thethermalvest @EnvAgency Hi Anne, I have referred this matter onto our Pollution Team to investigate ~ Thanks, Mark.

@whiterosegreen @EnvAgencyYNE @NEYorksNLincs @YorkshireWater Final effluent is fully treated, it’s not ‘sewage’ so not ‘really’ a problem. Hydraulically it looks like the outfall is submerged due to high river levels and the outfall pipe is backed up and surcharging through the covers. YW could replace with watertight  out down covers?

entity.name: Quarter-Final
entity.description: The Players Championship features the top 16 snooker players on the one-year ranking list. It's headed by World Number One Judd Trump, who defends the title he won so convincingly last season; beating Yan Bingtao 10-4 in the final. The tournament is the second of three that make up the Cazoo Series. Following the World Grand Prix in December, the Players Championship offers the chance to win valuable ranking points ahead of the series finale in March.
